homeHeader.title: Secure Your UAE Home — Legalize Your Tenancy with Ejari in Minutes
homeHeader.description: Imagine arriving in Dubai, ready to launch and scale your dream business — only to be blocked by unregistered tenancy. No utilities, no legal recourse, no visa processing. At One Nexuz, our seasoned PRO specialists handle every step of your Ejari registration, ensuring your contract is fully compliant and legally enforceable. Gain instant access to essential services, protect your rights, secure your business, and move in stress-free with our expert Ejari registration services in Dubai & beyond.

leftSection_5.title: Secure Your Ejari Contract with Our 4-Step Solution

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: We'll schedule a discovery call at your convenience to compile your tenancy contract, passport/visa copy, and landlord details.

items.title: Review & Verify Documents
items.description: Next, we’ll validate your lease, Emirates ID, and supporting documents against DLD and RERA requirements

items.title: Register with the DLD
items.description: Our PRO specialists then prepare and submit your Ejari application, issuing your certificate within seconds.

items.title: Receive Your Certificate
items.description: Lastly, we'll email your Ejari certificate, providing you with instant access to utilities, smooth visa processing, and legal protection.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Who needs Ejari registration?
items.answer: All tenants and landlords in Dubai — both individuals and businesses — must register their tenancy contracts through Ejari.

items.question: Can I register my Ejari certificate online?
items.answer: Yes, you can submit your application and secure your Ejari certificate from anywhere in the world.

items.question: What documents do I need to provide?
items.answer: Typically, we require a signed tenancy contract, copies of passport and visa, landlord details, DEWA premises number, and title deed (for verification). Our team will guide you through everything

items.question: How will I receive my Ejari certificate?
items.answer: Once registration is complete, you will receive an electronically issued Ejari certificate, ready for utilities, visa applications, and any government requirements

items.question: Can Ejari registration help with visa or residency applications?
items.answer: Absolutely. A registered Ejari lease is often required for residency visas, family sponsorships, and employee permits, ensuring your tenancy is legally recognized and accepted by government authorities.
